website_summaries.verdict: Convenient battery-powered combo edger-trimmer and leaf blower with gas-like variable speed operation.
pros: Variable speed control operates like a gas trimmer and edger
Command feed system advances trimmer line as its needed
Ergonomic handle for comfort while in use
cons: Line feed feature advances line automatically, and requires patience to get the line to cut

customer_reviews.title: Very poor quality - had to return it
customer_reviews.text: The blower worked fine but the cordless string trimmer was suspect from the beginning as the electrical switch that controlled the rotating head would not stay engaged. After using it intermittently for 1-2 hours, it quit completely and would not start again. We called WORX customer service and they were not available to take our call and we waited almost 2 hours for them to call us back. When they called back they were not at all helpful in trying to resolve the problem. The quality of the product is poor - made in China. We returned it and bought another brand. We will not purchase another WORX product.......ever. If we could give this product zero stars, we would.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia D.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome products
customer_reviews.text: Used spring through fall this year. Love the trimmer super easy to feed new line in and out. Use the blower more than anything. For being electric it is crazy powerful. Eats battery life in about 12-15 minutes full power but really pushes the air out. Lower power settings the batteries hold up well.
customer_reviews.author: NC

customer_reviews.title: Small yard, tools for sure.
customer_reviews.text: Not real impressed with the battery life or power. I know I shouldn’t expect 2 stroke power out of a battery, just had hoped for a little more oomph. Both tools do work good, just not as long and strong as I had hoped for.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: battery life
customer_reviews.text: Who do I write to have the battery replaced? It completely died and won't charge again. I'm sure it must be under warranty but don't know who to get in touch with or where to send it.
customer_reviews.author: JulieAnn Ables Chapin

customer_reviews.title: I Reccommend!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Wish the battery life was a bit longer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's worth the price and buy
customer_reviews.text: Yard looks great and exceeds my expectations. I'm very picky how I want my yard to look and very particular about edging and it does the job perfect. I have a corner lot and my yard is bigger than most and the batteries last the whole yard front and back.
customer_reviews.author: Mario Garza

customer_reviews.title: Terrific combo!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great set. If you use the highest setting on the blower the batter doesn't last terribly long.
customer_reviews.author: Dr Dad

customer_reviews.title: Been very impressed with these electric tools. I use ...
customer_reviews.text: Been very impressed with these electric tools. I use them to work on my one acre yard and they always get the job done. Granted I do have 4 batteries.
customer_reviews.author: jason t.

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Liked the way it handled. Battery is great and lasts as advertised
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wish I didn't wait so long to buy these tools ...
customer_reviews.text: Wish I didn't wait so long to buy these tools for maintaining my yard. I have the 56v mulching mower too. Hell of a trio.
customer_reviews.author: KBB

customer_reviews.title: Gas Like without the GAS problems
customer_reviews.text: Products have GAS LIKE power and battery life is fantastic
customer_reviews.author: Abelardo Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Solid just need alil battery strength
customer_reviews.text: Wish the batteries were stronger, but lightweight and efficient otherwise
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Convenience and power
customer_reviews.text: These tools are so easy to use! No cords, no gas, and plenty of power!
customer_reviews.author: SuziJBM

customer_reviews.title: Quality products!
customer_reviews.text: Quality stuff. Like the fact I don't have to put in gas. The only thing I wished I had researched more and got a high voltage brand with chainsaw in their lineup. Maybe they will add it at some point. I did buy extra batteries. Proved to be a good Idea. My finish yard is about 1 acres in a 3 1/2 yard.
customer_reviews.author: Al Locke

customer_reviews.title: Wrex Taking advantage of their customer
customer_reviews.text: worx Is very bad, three years ago I bought trimmer/edger 32V Charger and battery and one battery Extra trimmer burned Worx this-continue making tools 32V Stop producing ?????Advantage and monopoly
customer_reviews.author: tadiya

product_meta.title: WORX WG926 Turbine 56V 13" Cordless String Trimmer/Edger & Leaf Blower Combo Kit
product_meta.description: The WORX WG926 56-Volt combo kit gives you all the power you need with none of the gas to get your yard looking great. The combo kit includes the WG191 String trimmer/edger and the WG591 brushless TURBINE blower. The WG191 features a new command feed system, that can advance trimmer line instantly. No more bumping or waiting for line to advance before cutting. With command feed, the user electronically controls when to feed more line by pressing, then releasing, a pushbutton above the trigger. This feature not only conserves line, but eliminates downtime when edging and waiting for additional line to advance. This trimmer uses a thicker professional line (.080 in. Diameter), 1" x 20' in length that is more durable than conventional line. WORX incorporates a quick-change, easy-to-load, pre-wound Spool accessory, so there's no fumbling with line changes. The trimmer also has a new method to switch from trimming to edging. This new twist-and-edge feature operates smoothly for a seamless transition between functions by simply pressing button at the top of the shaft and turning it. The WG191 comes with two wheels to steak the tool while edging, but those wheels can be removed and housed on the lower shaft to give you full visibility while in trimming mode. The trimmer head Pivots from 0 degrees to 90 degrees to give you any Angle you need for trimming and edging. The WORX WG591 TURBINE 56-Volt cordless blower with Brushless Motor features variable Speed capabilities. This allows you to gently clean out corners of the garage or patio and then crank up the power to pile up those leaves in the yard. The WG591 is a powerful 56V max lithium, lightweight cordless blower with TURBINE technology and a Brushless Motor which delivers up to 465cfm of air velocity. This allows you to get the job done quickly and efficiently. The blower has an ergonomic handle to make the job comfortable and the tool easy to handle.
feature_bullets: Gas-Like Variable Speed Control For Additional Runtime
The Wg191 Features A New Command Feed System, That Can Advance Trimmer Line Instantly
The Blower Has An Ergonomic Handle To Make The Job Comfortable
